Class RestaurantRepository

java.lang.Object
uni.insubria.theknife.repository.RestaurantRepository
public class RestaurantRepository extends Object
This class provides methods to interact with the repository of Restaurant objects.

  • Method Details

    • addRestaurant

      public static RestaurantRepository.ERROR_CODE addRestaurant(Restaurant restaurant)
      Adds a new restaurant to the repository if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the restaurant to add
      Returns:
      ERROR_CODE an error code indicating the result of the operation: - DUPLICATED if the restaurant already exists in the repository - SERVICE_ERROR if an error occurs during saving the repository - NONE if the restaurant is successfully added

    • saveRestaurants

      public static void saveRestaurants(Map<String, Restaurant> restaurants) throws IOException
      Saves the provided map of restaurants to a JSON file.
      Parameters:
      restaurants - a map containing restaurant names as keys and corresponding Restaurant object values
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during file writing

    • loadRestaurantsCSV

      public static List<Restaurant> loadRestaurantsCSV()
      Loads a list of restaurants from a CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of Restaurant objects parsed from the CSV file.

    • loadRestaurants

      public static Map<String, Restaurant> loadRestaurants()
      Loads the restaurants from the .json file
      Returns:
      A list of Restaurant objects representing the restaurant data loaded from the JSON file

    • editRestaurant

      public static RestaurantRepository.ERROR_CODE editRestaurant(Restaurant restaurant)
      Edits the provided Restaurant object within the list of restaurants.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The Restaurant object to edit.
      Returns:
      ERROR_CODE.NONE if the restaurant was successfully edited, ERROR_CODE.SERVICE_ERROR if an error occurred.

    • deleteRestaurant

      public static RestaurantRepository.ERROR_CODE deleteRestaurant(Restaurant restaurant)
      Deletes the specified restaurant from the list of restaurants.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the restaurant to delete
      Returns:
      ERROR_CODE representing the outcome of the deletion operation: - DUPLICATED if the restaurant is duplicated - SERVICE_ERROR if an error occurred during saving the changes - NONE if the operation was successful
